alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued July 04 at 3:44PM CDT until July 05 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Wisconsin, Douglas County. In Minnesota, Carlton and South St. Louis County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band. * WHEN...Until 8 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will be the most dense right along the coast of Lake Superior and Highway 61, as well as along the St. Louis River valley, including the Twin Ports and Cloquet, and Interstate 35 from Duluth to Cloquet.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
